shrimp.name: FindPRhomb
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Penrose rhomb tile, by Derek Ledbetter, based on the projection method described in N. G. de Bruijn, "Algebraic theory of Penrose's non-periodic tilings of the plane", in "Proceedings of the Koninklijke Nederlandse Akademie van Wetenschappen", Series A, 84, 1981. This function returns Penrose rhomb tile values, and tile types, being 0 = skinny, and 1 = fat.
